Reference

Read Data

Read source data files

read_src_dir()

Read in every domain in a source data directory.

View SDTM Domain Abbreviations

Data Creation

Write NONMEM data set

write_derived()

Write a derived data set and corresponding meta data

nm_write()

Write an NMTRAN data set and corresponding meta data

distinct_subject_columns()

Determine columns with only one unique per subject.

nm_validate()

Validate an NMTRAN dataset
